thread.title: 2017 Brit Awards: Drake & A Tribe Called Quest Win, British Rappers Lose
thread.title_full: 2017 Brit Awards: Drake & A Tribe Called Quest Win, British Rappers Lose

author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: 2017 Brit Awards: Drake & A Tribe Called Quest Win, British Rappers Lose
text:
0 
London, England ‚Äì Drake might have lost to Chance The Rapper for Best Rap Album at last week‚Äôs Grammys, but he came up victorious at Wednesday night‚Äôs Brit Awards, snatching the Best International Male Solo artist accolade. He beat out stiff competition from Bruno Mars, Bon Iver and his fellow Canadians The Weeknd and the late Leonard Cohen. 
A Tribe Called Quest also won the major honor of Best International Group for their return to the scene in 2016. They beat out popular acts such as Kings of Leon and Twenty One Pilots. 
It was a disappointing night, however, for the UK‚Äôs biggest grime stars. Skepta and Stormzy had been both been nominated for British Breakthrough Act, but lost out to singer-songwriter Rag‚Äôn‚ÄôBone Man. 
Stormzy can still say that he had a good night, utterly killing a duet with Ed Sheeran on the singer‚Äôs ‚ÄúShape Of You.‚Äù 
The same can‚Äôt be said for Drake‚Äôs buddy and collaborator Skepta, whose performance of ‚ÄúShutdown‚Äù was heavily censored, making for a disjointed audio experience for viewers at home. 
Naturally, those watching took the Brits to task over their decision to mute much of Skepta‚Äôs biggest hit. Brits ‚Äì Let's invite Skepta 
‚Äî Lawrence James (@DJLawrenceJames) February 22, 2017 Our favourite lyric of Skepta's ‚Äì"Shut Down" is "Audio Muted". Speaks to us on a spiritual level. #BRITs2017 #brits pic.twitter.com/fVV518syEC 
‚Äî We Are Generation Z (@GenerationZMag) February 22, 2017 Dermort literally said "shit" and Skepta can't say "pussy" smh. #brits 
‚Äî GRM Daily (@GRMDAILY) February 22, 2017 My reaction to Skepta being bleeped out #BRITs2017 pic.twitter.com/bmZ64JE6Xu 
‚Äî Shazid Miah (@shazidmiah) February 22, 2017 #brits No point having Skepta on if you're gonna mute out half the song!!!! Ruined it for me! 
‚Äî Ibrahim Banks üëë (@TheShowOff85) February 23, 2017 Why bother getting Skepta to perform when you're just going to mute the whole thing. Wankers 
The offending lyric that most people wanted to hear was ‚ÄúRing, ring, pussy ‚Äî it‚Äôs shutdown,‚Äù a lyric that refers to Skepta‚Äôs track ‚ÄúIt Ain‚Äôt Safe.‚Äù 
Well, that‚Äôs what a real shut down sounds like.
